short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn text into beautifully animated gifs for your social media posts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform text into short attention grabbing customizable animations.

SIMPLE STEPS

1. Write + style your message
2. Choose and customize your animation
3. Generate your GIF and drag to Twitter/Facebook etc (or download for later)

Perfect for making your social media posts more interesting to look at!

FEATURES

✅ Supports emojis
✅ Custom text background with different colors, opacity and size
✅ 6 Animations to choose from (with more to come)
✅ Customizable animations
✅ Export to GIF or Image
